title: &pizza
description_html:
FEATURES

// create one &pizza account for app and online ordering

// order ahead and pay for pick-up at your favorite shop

// pay for in-shop orders by scanning your QR code

// earn rewards for all purchases: $1 spent = 10 points

// redeem your points through the app or online for pies, drinks, sweets, swag, events and more



Get the app. Get the rewards.

Questions? Text ‘ANDROID APP’ to 20003

#andpizza | @andpizza
